remarks: If ` Y ` is a normal subgroup of ` G ` , then ` H = G / Y ` is a group, called the quotient of ` G ` by ` Y ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
qusgrp.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
qusgrp $p |- ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) -> H e. Grp ) $.
